@graph.name: Easy Track India Telematics Integration - Connected Vehicle Platform - Route4Me Platform
@graph.description: Easy Track India is a leading company who has established a wide customer base in the GPS vehicle tracking systems all over India. Since our inception, we have tried our best to offer the customers of India a value for their money in the name of our products. We have a vast range of products varying from the human tracking system to pet tracking system, from Bike tracking systemto valuable property tracking system and others. When we stepped up into the market, there were so much competition in the GPS tracking market but within a short span of 5 years, we have a millions of satisfied client base behind us. You can say that, right now we are at a place in the market where we can claim to have serviced to people of India well and satisfactorily. With our extremely exemplary attitude to made great quality products, we have created a benchmark for the rest.

additionalProperty.name: Hardwired Non-OBD Harness
additionalProperty.value: A hardwired non-OBD telematics harness allows for more advanced features and deeper integration with a vehicle's electrical system compared to standard OBD (On-Board Diagnostics) port connections. These harnesses often include power, ignition and ground wires, enabling features like engine immobilisation, driver behavior monitoring and detailed diagnostics.

additionalProperty.name: Driver's behavior monitoring
additionalProperty.value: A driver behavior monitoring system is a technology-driven solution that continuously tracks and analyzes how drivers operate their vehicles. By using vehicle telematics, GPS and various in-vehicle sensors, the system collects data on driving actions - speed, acceleration, braking and cornering - to provide real-time insights into driver performance.

additionalProperty.name: GPS Tracking
additionalProperty.value: Telematics incorporates GPS tracking as a core component, enabling the monitoring of vehicle location and movement. Telematics systems use GPS data, along with other information from the vehicle's on-board diagnostics, to provide a comprehensive view of vehicle performance and driver behavior. This data is transmitted to a central system where it can be analyzed and used for fleet management, improving efficiency and enhancing safety.

additionalProperty.name: Maintenance Schedules
additionalProperty.value: Telematics enhances fleet maintenance by providing data-driven insights for scheduling and optimizing maintenance activities. By tracking vehicle data like mileage, engine hours and fuel consumption, telematics allows for more precise and proactive maintenance, leading to reduced downtime, improved efficiency and lower costs.
